ISSUE.TITLE: podman exec, with no args, exits 255
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ```console $ podman run -d --name foo quay.io/libpod/testimage:20240123 top d65a49e7f6511a1e4d77f8de912c9b9524d18dfcc1e11f0c23a7280d56288fa5 $ podman exec foo Error: must provide a non-empty command to start an exec session: invalid argument $ echo $? 255 ``` Seems weird. I would expect 126, but 125 is also cool. `podman-remote` exits 125.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #22349 from jwhonce/wip/swagger_serve [CI:DOCS] Swap out javascript engine

COMMIT.MESSAGE: podman exec CID without command should exit 125 Fixes: https://github.com/containers/podman/issues/22329 Signed-off-by: Daniel J Walsh <dwalsh@redhat.com>
